entity.name: Atanu Garai
entity.description:
Form builder for social impact data collection using ODK, KoboToolbox, Avni, SurveyCTO, CommCare, DHIS2, and more. We're focused on making data collection easier and more efficient for social impact organizations worldwide.

Our platform enables researchers and organizations to create, manage, and deploy sophisticated data collection forms without technical expertise.

We believe in open source and interoperability across different data collection platforms.

projects.name: CAPIBuilder ODK
projects.description:
Form builder for social impact data collection using ODK. Create, manage, and deploy ODK-compatible forms with an intuitive interface. Features include drag-and-drop form building, multi-language support, complex skip logic, and automated XML generation.

The platform supports various question types, validation rules, and complex survey logic while maintaining compatibility with ODK's XML schema.

plans.description: Fund the development of RAG pipeline to automate form creation from word/spreadsheet CAPI drafts and deploy in ODK and other platforms.
